Quote.Author: Debbie Reynolds
Quote.QuoteValue: I love having my ghosts, and I love having my memories

Quote.Author: Debbie Reynolds
Quote.QuoteValue: The only way to make it through life is to fight

Quote.Author: Debbie Reynolds
Quote.QuoteValue: When you were under contract, you did what you were told to do

Quote.Author: Debbie Reynolds
Quote.QuoteValue: I spent some special years in my hometown of El Paso

Quote.Author: Debi Mazar
Quote.QuoteValue: With the breast-feeding, I really love the bonding. Real life is more important to me

Quote.Author: Debi Mazar
Quote.QuoteValue: I truly have a love-hate thing with the press

Quote.Author: Debi Mazar
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is just too short to count calories forever!

Quote.Author: Debi Mazar
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm naturally a muscular gal with some curves, so eating a Mediterranean diet makes my body happy

Quote.Author: Debi Mazar
Quote.QuoteValue: Being typecast is a great thing for an actor. I was considered one of the New York mob actors

Quote.Author: Debi Mazar
Quote.QuoteValue: My wrists, which are tattooed with my daughters' names, are always occupied by a watch

Quote.Author: Debi Mazar
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a very high metabolism, and I have to constantly eat to keep on going

Quote.Author: Debi Mazar
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a girl who's curvy, and I'm Latvian, but I don't have hips, and I have a tiny waist

Quote.Author: Debi Mazar
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't live without carbs

Quote.Author: Debi Mazar
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a full Tuscan lunch and dinner every day in my home; my husband's a fantastic chef

Quote.Author: Deborah Tannen
Quote.QuoteValue: Each person's life is lived as a series of conversations

Quote.Author: Deborah Tannen
Quote.QuoteValue: Each underestimates her own power and overestimates the other's

Quote.Author: Deborah Tannen
Quote.QuoteValue: We all know we are unique individuals, but we tend to see others as representatives of groups

Quote.Author: Deborah Tannen
Quote.QuoteValue: We tend to look through language and not realize how much power language has

Quote.Author: Deborah Tannen
Quote.QuoteValue: Our ways of relating to each other become like habits

Quote.Author: Deborah Tannen
Quote.QuoteValue: All of us aspire to be powerful, and we all want to connect with others

Quote.Author: Deborah Tannen
Quote.QuoteValue: For women, detailed conversation is our lifeblood, while for men it's just not as critical

Quote.Author: Deborah Tannen
Quote.QuoteValue: We all feel wistfulness or regret about roads not taken

Quote.Author: Deborah Tannen
Quote.QuoteValue: Birth order is fascinating, and it is forever

Quote.Author: Deborah Tannen
Quote.QuoteValue: Relationships are made of talk - and talk is for girls and women

Quote.Author: Dee Hock
Quote.QuoteValue: Every mind is a room packed with archaic furniture

Quote.Author: Dee Hock
Quote.QuoteValue: Make an empty space in any corner of your mind, and creativity will instantly fill it

Quote.Author: Dee Hock
Quote.QuoteValue: An organization, no matter how well designed, is only as good as the people who live and work in it

Quote.Author: Dee Hock
Quote.QuoteValue: Make a careful list of all things done to you that you abhorred. Don't do them to others, ever

Quote.Author: Dee Hock
Quote.QuoteValue: Make another list of things done for you that you loved. Do them for others, always

Quote.Author: Dee Hock
Quote.QuoteValue: Experience is easy to provide and quickly put to good use by people with all the other qualities

Quote.Author: Dee Hock
Quote.QuoteValue: Preserve substance; modify form; know the difference

Quote.Author: Dee Hock
Quote.QuoteValue: Clean out a corner of your mind and creativity will instantly fill it

Quote.Author: Dee Hock
Quote.QuoteValue: Substance is enduring, form is ephemeral

Quote.Author: Dee Hock
Quote.QuoteValue: Language was a huge expansion of that capacity to deal with information

Quote.Author: Deepika Padukone
Quote.QuoteValue: I like statement earrings

Quote.Author: Deepika Padukone
Quote.QuoteValue: The fruit of your own hard work is the sweetest

Quote.Author: Deepika Padukone
Quote.QuoteValue: Maybe because I am from a sports background, I don't give up easily. I am a fighter

Quote.Author: Deepika Padukone
Quote.QuoteValue: Relationships or not, I believe that people don't need to know about my life beyond a certain point

Quote.Author: Deepika Padukone
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a strong believer in the fact that women are born to multi-task. God has made us like that

Quote.Author: Deepika Padukone
Quote.QuoteValue: My parents worry all the time because I trust people very easily

Quote.Author: Deepika Padukone
Quote.QuoteValue: I meditate. I breathe out what I can't control and focus on the positives

Quote.Author: Deepika Padukone
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not into superhero movies, but I love cartoons. Tweety bird is my favourite

Quote.Author: Deepika Padukone
Quote.QuoteValue: There are days when I love a fresh blow-dry, but sometimes I just go with bedhead

Quote.Author: Deepika Padukone
Quote.QuoteValue: India is home, and that's never going to change

Quote.Author: Dele Alli
Quote.QuoteValue: We've got to be right mentally - to stay focused and not get carried away if results go our way

Quote.Author: Dele Alli
Quote.QuoteValue: I haven't changed. I'm still the same boy, and I'm just going to keep doing what I'm doing

Quote.Author: Dele Alli
Quote.QuoteValue: When I signed for Tottenham, my target was to get 10 starts

Quote.Author: Dele Alli
Quote.QuoteValue: You always look to impress

Quote.Author: Dele Alli
Quote.QuoteValue: When things don't go your way, you've got to keep trying to do the right things

Quote.Author: Dele Alli
Quote.QuoteValue: It is important we don't become complacent, do our job and stay professional

Quote.Author: Dele Alli
Quote.QuoteValue: Whoever is managing you, you want to play your best and do your best for your country

Quote.Author: Dele Alli
Quote.QuoteValue: Defensively, I could be a lot better; my decision-making at times can be a bit poor

Quote.Author: Dele Alli
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not something I worry about: I can control my temper!

Quote.Author: Dele Alli
Quote.QuoteValue: Whoever you're playing against, you want to do as well as you can

Quote.Author: Demetri Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: I wanna make a jigsaw puzzle that's 40,000 pieces. And when you finish it, it says 'go outside.'

Quote.Author: Demetri Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: The bird, the bee, the running child are all the same to the sliding glass door

Quote.Author: Demetri Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: Saying, 'I'm sorry' is the same as saying, ' I apologize.' Except at a funeral

Quote.Author: Demetri Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: I used to play sports. Then I realized you can buy trophies. Now I am good at everything

Quote.Author: Demetri Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: The worst time to have a heart attack is during a game of charades

Quote.Author: Demetri Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: A drunk driver is very dangerous. So is a drunk backseat driver if he's persuasive

Quote.Author: Demetri Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: Another term for balloon is bad breath holder

Quote.Author: Demetri Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: The digital camera is a great invention because it allows us to reminisce. Instantly

Quote.Author: Demetri Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: My plumbing is all screwed up. Because it turns out, I do not own a garbage disposal

Quote.Author: Demetri Martin
Quote.QuoteValue: I think it's interesting that 'cologne' rhymes with 'alone.'

Quote.Author: Demi Lovato
Quote.QuoteValue: Creativity is what helps me escape a lot of my inner demons

Quote.Author: Demi Lovato
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to be fearless

Quote.Author: Demi Lovato
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes I think, 'Why couldn't I have been normal?'

Quote.Author: Demi Lovato
Quote.QuoteValue: Rocker dudes don't have a lot of swagger

Quote.Author: Demi Lovato
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes you don't know who you can and cannot trust. I still learn that over and over again

Quote.Author: Demi Lovato
Quote.QuoteValue: I love life on the road. I'm in a different city every night and it never gets old

Quote.Author: Demi Lovato
Quote.QuoteValue: I still had a normal childhood with my friends from school

Quote.Author: Demi Lovato
Quote.QuoteValue: I've come to realize your career is all about the choices you make. Every single one matters

Quote.Author: Demi Lovato
Quote.QuoteValue: If it takes me 10 years to be the musician I want to be, great

Quote.Author: Demi Lovato
Quote.QuoteValue: After hundreds of auditions and nothing, you're sitting home and wondering, 'What am I doing?'

Quote.Author: Democritus
Quote.QuoteValue: Happiness resides not in possessions, and not in gold, happiness dwells in the soul

Quote.Author: Democritus
Quote.QuoteValue: Our sins are more easily remembered than our good deeds

Quote.Author: Democritus
Quote.QuoteValue: I would rather discover one true cause than gain the kingdom of Persia

Quote.Author: Democritus
Quote.QuoteValue: Men should strive to think much and know little

Quote.Author: Democritus
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing exists except atoms and empty space; everything else is opinion

Quote.Author: Democritus
Quote.QuoteValue: Raising children is an uncertain thing; success is reached only after a life of battle and worry

Quote.Author: Democritus
Quote.QuoteValue: Good means not merely not to do wrong, but rather not to desire to do wrong

Quote.Author: Democritus
Quote.QuoteValue: Throw moderation to the winds, and the greatest pleasures bring the greatest pains

Quote.Author: Democritus
Quote.QuoteValue: It is godlike ever to think on something beautiful and on something new

Quote.Author: Democritus
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything existing in the universe is the fruit of chance and necessity

Quote.Author: Denis Diderot
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to make it happen

Quote.Author: Denis Diderot
Quote.QuoteValue: There is only one passion, the passion for happiness

Quote.Author: Denis Diderot
Quote.QuoteValue: The best doctor is the one you run to and can't find

Quote.Author: Denis Diderot
Quote.QuoteValue: Skepticism is the first step on the road to philosophy

Quote.Author: Denis Diderot
Quote.QuoteValue: The blood of Jesus Christ can cover a multitude of sins, it seems to me

Quote.Author: Denis Diderot
Quote.QuoteValue: No man has received from nature the right to command his fellow human beings

Quote.Author: Denis Diderot
Quote.QuoteValue: The God of the Christians is a father who makes much of his apples, and very little of his children

Quote.Author: Denis Diderot
Quote.QuoteValue: Only passions, great passions can elevate the soul to great things

Quote.Author: Denis Diderot
Quote.QuoteValue: Pithy sentences are like sharp nails which force truth upon our memory

Quote.Author: Denis Diderot
Quote.QuoteValue: Justice is the first virtue of those who command, and stops the complaints of those who obey

Quote.Author: Denis Leary
Quote.QuoteValue: Not eating meat is a decision, eating meat is an instinct

Quote.Author: Denis Leary
Quote.QuoteValue: Firefighters are some of the most selfless public servants you will ever encounter

Quote.Author: Denis Leary
Quote.QuoteValue: I want you to take away the hope because that's the thing that's killing me

Quote.Author: Denis Leary
Quote.QuoteValue: My biggest regret in life is that I didn't hit John Denver in the mouth while I has the chance

Quote.Author: Denis Leary
Quote.QuoteValue: Vacuuming is great. I do the laundry. I love washing machines. I'm the maid in my house

Quote.Author: Denis Leary
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm still pretty self-centered, greedy and angry

Quote.Author: Denis Leary
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm really good at laundry, and I have no problem cleaning the kitchen

Quote.Author: Denis Leary
Quote.QuoteValue: I've eaten things that didn't complain this much

Quote.Author: Denis Leary
Quote.QuoteValue: Hockey's my favorite sport

Quote.Author: Denis Leary
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not really a Spider-Man fan. I'm more of a Batman guy

Quote.Author: Denis Villeneuve
Quote.QuoteValue: The problem in cinema is that you can never predict what will happen

Quote.Author: Denis Villeneuve
Quote.QuoteValue: I think a good director is a good listener

Quote.Author: Denis Villeneuve
Quote.QuoteValue: In contradiction and paradox, you can find truth

Quote.Author: Denis Villeneuve
Quote.QuoteValue: Making poetry with a camera - that's the essence of what I do

Quote.Author: Denis Villeneuve
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been in love with language. My favorite book is a dictionary. I have always loved words

Quote.Author: Denis Villeneuve
Quote.QuoteValue: When I use violence in a movie, it's just to express the power, the impact of it

Quote.Author: Denis Villeneuve
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not about choosing a specific genre; that's not how I go about deciding what movies to make

Quote.Author: Denis Villeneuve
Quote.QuoteValue: I like the idea that cinema is a spectacle

Quote.Author: Denis Villeneuve
Quote.QuoteValue: I always thought, like everyone, that Hollywood was a superhero factory

Quote.Author: Denis Villeneuve
Quote.QuoteValue: I always have a strange feeling that projects choose you. It's always mysterious

Quote.Author: Denis Waitley
Quote.QuoteValue: A smile is the light in your window that tells others that there is a caring, sharing person inside

Quote.Author: Denis Waitley
Quote.QuoteValue: Determination gives you the resolve to keep going in spite of the roadblocks that lay before you

Quote.Author: Denis Waitley
Quote.QuoteValue: You must look within for value, but must look beyond for perspective

Quote.Author: Denis Waitley
Quote.QuoteValue: Expect the best, plan for the worst, and prepare to be surprised

Quote.Author: Denis Waitley
Quote.QuoteValue: Chase your passion, not your pension

Quote.Author: Denis Waitley
Quote.QuoteValue: You must stick to your conviction, but be ready to abandon your assumptions

Quote.Author: Denis Waitley
Quote.QuoteValue: You must welcome change as the rule but not as your ruler

Quote.Author: Denis Waitley
Quote.QuoteValue: Winners are people with definite purpose in life

Quote.Author: Denis Waitley
Quote.QuoteValue: Losers make promises they often break. Winners make commitments they always keep

Quote.Author: Denis Waitley
Quote.QuoteValue: Success in life comes not from holding a good hand, but in playing a poor hand well

Quote.Author: Dennis Farina
Quote.QuoteValue: I think first impressions are important when you pick up a script

Quote.Author: Dennis Farina
Quote.QuoteValue: The British have slang words, as we do, but it was fun

Quote.Author: Dennis Farina
Quote.QuoteValue: As far as carrying the American banner, you just do what's right for the kids

Quote.Author: Dennis Farina
Quote.QuoteValue: I've tried writing. Two days later I'd go visit it and say, Jesus Christ, who wrote this crap?

Quote.Author: Dennis Farina
Quote.QuoteValue: Rooting for the Cubs is not easy, but the best things in life never are

Quote.Author: Dennis Farina
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the funny things in life to me is a guy who takes himself very seriously

Quote.Author: Dennis Farina
Quote.QuoteValue: I have no message or answers to social questions

Quote.Author: Dennis Farina
Quote.QuoteValue: My parents, I don't know about 'strict,' but I would say they were fair and judicious, you know?

Quote.Author: Dennis Farina
Quote.QuoteValue: I was a policeman for 18 years

Quote.Author: Dennis Farina
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a home in Arizona. I go a couple months a year, but basically Chicago is my home

Quote.Author: Dennis Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: A recent police study found that you're much more likely to get shot by a fat cop if you run

Quote.Author: Dennis Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: The death penalty is becoming a way of life in this country

Quote.Author: Dennis Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to help the helpless, but I don't want to help the clueless

Quote.Author: Dennis Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm one of the more pessimistic cats on the planet. I make Van Gogh look like a rodeo clown

Quote.Author: Dennis Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: Born again?! No, I'm not. Excuse me for getting it right the first time

Quote.Author: Dennis Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: Washington, DC is to lying what Wisconsin is to cheese

Quote.Author: Dennis Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: I rant, therefore I am

Quote.Author: Dennis Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: Here in Hollywood you can actually get a marriage license printed on an Etch-A-Sketch

Quote.Author: Dennis Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: Elected office holds more perks than Elvis' nightstand

Quote.Author: Dennis Miller
Quote.QuoteValue: Never have lives less lived been more chronicled

Quote.Author: Dennis Potter
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything we do has consequences

Quote.Author: Dennis Potter
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to assert something about yourself in order to be yourself

Quote.Author: Dennis Potter
Quote.QuoteValue: The more my work improves or broadens or widens, the more surely I tame myself

Quote.Author: Dennis Potter
Quote.QuoteValue: Metaphor is embodied in language

Quote.Author: Dennis Potter
Quote.QuoteValue: It is a dangerous thing to have instant access to your emotions

Quote.Author: Dennis Potter
Quote.QuoteValue: Children can write poetry and then, unless they're poets, they stop when reach puberty

Quote.Author: Dennis Potter
Quote.QuoteValue: I did not fully understand the dread term 'terminal illness' until I saw Heathrow for myself

Quote.Author: Dennis Potter
Quote.QuoteValue: The trouble with words is that you never know whose mouths they have been in

Quote.Author: Dennis Potter
Quote.QuoteValue: I think childhood is to everyone a lost land

Quote.Author: Dennis Potter
Quote.QuoteValue: To love it too much is to obscure and not see what is there

Quote.Author: Dennis Prager
Quote.QuoteValue: The Left has always sought single, non-values-based explanations for human behavior

Quote.Author: Dennis Prager
Quote.QuoteValue: It is easier to take a position in the abstract than when it hits home

Quote.Author: Dennis Prager
Quote.QuoteValue: Those indoctrinated by leftist thinking become largely incapable of making accurate moral judgments

Quote.Author: Dennis Prager
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a lot more power in calm than in vituperation

Quote.Author: Dennis Prager
Quote.QuoteValue: Those who believe in nothing are very, very jealous and angry at those who believe in something

Quote.Author: Dennis Prager
Quote.QuoteValue: Socialism values equality more than liberty

Quote.Author: Dennis Prager
Quote.QuoteValue: Most young people have tremendous respect for older people's views

Quote.Author: Dennis Prager
Quote.QuoteValue: Corruption is Africa's greatest problem. Not poverty. Not lack of riches. Not racism

Quote.Author: Dennis Prager
Quote.QuoteValue: There is little correlation between the circumstances of people's lives and how happy they are

Quote.Author: Dennis Prager
Quote.QuoteValue: Liberals tend to put the onus of your success on society and conservatives on you and your family

Quote.Author: Dennis Quaid
Quote.QuoteValue: I always want to find the best burger in town

Quote.Author: Dennis Quaid
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to work with great people. Great people really make you better

Quote.Author: Dennis Quaid
Quote.QuoteValue: I really love doing what I do, being an actor. It's the greatest. You can do it until you die

Quote.Author: Dennis Quaid
Quote.QuoteValue: I went out for the football team but, you know, I was too small. That's how I wound up in drama

Quote.Author: Dennis Quaid
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm lucky. I have a high metabolism, so I pretty much eat anything and everything

Quote.Author: Dennis Quaid
Quote.QuoteValue: When you break up, your whole identity is shattered. It's like death

Quote.Author: Dennis Quaid
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a resistance to change in things that I feel comfortable with and that I'm used to

Quote.Author: Dennis Quaid
Quote.QuoteValue: What, like I want to look like Dick Clark? No. I think I look great with liver spots

Quote.Author: Dennis Quaid
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes in movies, I still have to be the hero, but it's not all that important to me anymore

Quote.Author: Dennis Quaid
Quote.QuoteValue: I've done so many movies that when I see them I don't really watch them

Quote.Author: Dennis Rodman
Quote.QuoteValue: This life is like a swimming pool. You dive into the water, but you can't see how deep it is

Quote.Author: Dennis Rodman
Quote.QuoteValue: The one thing I do that nobody else does is jump three and four times for one rebound

Quote.Author: Dennis Rodman
Quote.QuoteValue: When a high-profile personality lives like I do, everybody thinks that person is fated to die young

Quote.Author: Dennis Rodman
Quote.QuoteValue: Why should I try to make you believe the things I believe in?

Quote.Author: Dennis Rodman
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm trying to find new ways to make this game more attractive

Quote.Author: Dennis Rodman
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm starting to see players copy what I do. I'm flattered

Quote.Author: Dennis Rodman
Quote.QuoteValue: Everybody's talking trash these days, so why not keep quiet?

Quote.Author: Dennis Rodman
Quote.QuoteValue: There is so much hypocrisy in sports

Quote.Author: Dennis Rodman
Quote.QuoteValue: I couldn't care less if the guy I'm guarding has HIV. I'm going to slam him anyway

Quote.Author: Dennis Rodman
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't trust what this life has given me

Quote.Author: Denzel Washington
Quote.QuoteValue: You pray for rain, you gotta deal with the mud too. That's a part of it

Quote.Author: Denzel Washington
Quote.QuoteValue: I never really had the classic struggle. I had faith

Quote.Author: Denzel Washington
Quote.QuoteValue: I say luck is when an opportunity comes along and you're prepared for it

Quote.Author: Denzel Washington
Quote.QuoteValue: My faith helps me understand that circumstances don't dictate my happiness, my inner peace

Quote.Author: Denzel Washington
Quote.QuoteValue: Man gives you the award but God gives you the reward

Quote.Author: Denzel Washington
Quote.QuoteValue: I think a role model is a mentor - someone you see on a daily basis, and you learn from them

Quote.Author: Denzel Washington
Quote.QuoteValue: Acting is just a way of making a living, the family is life

Quote.Author: Denzel Washington
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't trust the pilot, don't go

Quote.Author: Denzel Washington
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to grab moments when they happen. I like to improvise and ad lib

Quote.Author: Denzel Washington
Quote.QuoteValue: The poorest people are the sweetest people

Quote.Author: Derek Bok
Quote.QuoteValue: There is far too much law for those who can afford it and far too little for those who cannot

Quote.Author: Derek Bok
Quote.QuoteValue: I suspect that no community will become humane and caring by restricting what its members can say

Quote.Author: Derek Bok
Quote.QuoteValue: I think one thing that does cause unhappiness is protracted anxiety and worry

Quote.Author: Derek Bok
Quote.QuoteValue: The oldest of the arts and the youngest of the professions

Quote.Author: Derek Bok
Quote.QuoteValue: Freshly minted Ph.Ds typically teach the way their favorite professors taught

Quote.Author: Derek Bok
Quote.QuoteValue: Greater inequality in Europe has made people less happy

Quote.Author: Derek Bok
Quote.QuoteValue: Fewer than half of all university professors publish as much as one article per year

Quote.Author: Derek Bok
Quote.QuoteValue: Early admission programs tend to advantage the advantaged

Quote.Author: Derek Bok
Quote.QuoteValue: Universities are in a position where they can think very creatively

Quote.Author: Derek Bok
Quote.QuoteValue: Good teaching is creating really interesting generalizations out of war stories

Quote.Author: Derek Jeter
Quote.QuoteValue: I love it when people doubt me. It makes me work harder to prove them wrong

Quote.Author: Derek Jeter
Quote.QuoteValue: When you put a lot of hard work into one goal and you achieve it, that's a really good feeling

Quote.Author: Derek Jeter
Quote.QuoteValue: You know what I want to do? Wake up one weekend and not have to go anywhere and do nothing

Quote.Author: Derek Jeter
Quote.QuoteValue: My best vacation is somewhere I could hide, somewhere warm and not a lot of people around

Quote.Author: Derek Jeter
Quote.QuoteValue: Your image isn't your character. Character is what you are as a person

Quote.Author: Derek Jeter
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't just accidentally show up in the World Series

Quote.Author: Derek Jeter
Quote.QuoteValue: God, I hope I wear this jersey forever

Quote.Author: Derek Jeter
Quote.QuoteValue: I think sometimes people need to get used to an idea

Quote.Author: Derek Jeter
Quote.QuoteValue: I've found that it's easier to stay in shape than it is to get into shape

Quote.Author: Derek Jeter
Quote.QuoteValue: My heroes, my dreams, and my future lay in Yankee Stadium. And they can't take that away from me

Quote.Author: Desi Arnaz
Quote.QuoteValue: Joe McCarthy and his Senate hearings were like witch-hunts

Quote.Author: Desi Arnaz
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody bats 500. We all make mistakes

Quote.Author: Desi Arnaz
Quote.QuoteValue: An audience is so important. I would never have had the guts to dub in that big a laugh

Quote.Author: Desi Arnaz
Quote.QuoteValue: Failure is the most terrible thing in our business. When we fail, the whole world knows about it

Quote.Author: Desi Arnaz
Quote.QuoteValue: Lucy and I would love furiously and fight furiously

Quote.Author: Desi Arnaz
Quote.QuoteValue: Since I was very young I have always worked hard at whatever I have had to do

Quote.Author: Desi Arnaz
Quote.QuoteValue: Good things do not come easy. The road is lined with pitfalls

Quote.Author: Desi Arnaz
Quote.QuoteValue: The thing I remember about New York was how little I felt. I arrived with one small bag and $15

Quote.Author: Desi Arnaz
Quote.QuoteValue: Al Jolson was one of the greatest entertainers who ever lived

Quote.Author: Desi Arnaz
Quote.QuoteValue: Drinking intensifies all your pressures and your needs

Quote.Author: Desiderius Erasmus
Quote.QuoteValue: Give light, and the darkness will disappear of itself

Quote.Author: Desiderius Erasmus
Quote.QuoteValue: Your library is your paradise

Quote.Author: Desiderius Erasmus
Quote.QuoteValue: He who allows oppression shares the crime

Quote.Author: Desiderius Erasmus
Quote.QuoteValue: In the kingdom of the blind, the one-eyed man is king

Quote.Author: Desiderius Erasmus
Quote.QuoteValue: Prevention is better than cure

Quote.Author: Desiderius Erasmus
Quote.QuoteValue: When I get a little money I buy books; and if any is left I buy food and clothes

Quote.Author: Desiderius Erasmus
Quote.QuoteValue: It is the chiefest point of happiness that a man is willing to be what he is

Quote.Author: Desiderius Erasmus
Quote.QuoteValue: By a Carpenter mankind was made, and only by that Carpenter can mankind be remade

Quote.Author: Desiderius Erasmus
Quote.QuoteValue: Fortune favors the audacious

Quote.Author: Desiderius Erasmus
Quote.QuoteValue: Man's mind is so formed that it is far more susceptible to falsehood than to truth

Quote.Author: Diana Ross
Quote.QuoteValue: If I have someone who believes in me, I can move mountains

Quote.Author: Diana Ross
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, you do need mentors, but in the end, you really just need to believe in yourself

Quote.Author: Diana Ross
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't get fat, I get skinny

Quote.Author: Diana Ross
Quote.QuoteValue: It takes a long time to get to be a diva. I mean, you gotta work at it

Quote.Author: Diana Ross
Quote.QuoteValue: It has always been, and still is, my intention to build a playground in Central Park

Quote.Author: Diana Ross
Quote.QuoteValue: I want an autobiography without revealing any personal information

Quote.Author: Diana Ross
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have to sit around and wait for the next movie to come along, I can go out and sing

Quote.Author: Diana Ross
Quote.QuoteValue: I was brought up in this part of Detroit that they used to call the ghetto

Quote.Author: Diana Ross
Quote.QuoteValue: I look forward to the future - and going into the studio to make new music

Quote.Author: Diana Ross
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think getting in and out of a limousine has anything to do with being an icon

Quote.Author: Diane Arbus
Quote.QuoteValue: A photograph is a secret about a secret. The more it tells you the less you know

Quote.Author: Diane Arbus
Quote.QuoteValue: The more specific you are, the more general it'll be

Quote.Author: Diane Arbus
Quote.QuoteValue: My favorite thing is to go where I've never been

Quote.Author: Diane Arbus
Quote.QuoteValue: Love involves a peculiar unfathomable combination of understanding and misunderstanding

Quote.Author: Diane Arbus
Quote.QuoteValue: The thing that's important to know is that you never know. You're always sort of feeling your way

Quote.Author: Diane Arbus
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing is ever the same as they said it was
